sentences.en: I must reiterate that our position on this issue is very clear.
sentences.cn: 我必须重申我们对这一项议题的立场很清楚.

sentences.en: I want to reiterate that our conventional weapons are superior.
sentences.cn: 我要再次重申，我们的常规武器是一流的。

sentences.en: I wish to reiterate that my previous warning of being on hello gh alert remains.
sentences.cn: 我但愿重申,之前保持高度警戒的正告傲然有用.

sentences.en: I would reiterate what we said earlier this week, that the accusations against are without foundation.
sentences.cn: 我要重申本周早些时候说过的话, 对于他们的指控都是毫无根据的.

sentences.en: LA: First, let me reiterate what you said about Yao.
sentences.cn: 大: 首先, 我再强调一下大姚这个亮点.

sentences.en: Let me reiterate the most important points.
sentences.cn: 我来把最重要的几点重申一遍。

sentences.en: My opinion is confirmed, and I reiterate my advice.'
sentences.cn: 我的意见得到了证实, 我重申我的劝告. ”

sentences.en: Please be good enough to reiterate your point.
Referring to this affair, I have to reiterate my opinion.
sentences.cn: 齿及此事, 我不得不重申一下我的观点.

sentences.en: Resent studies reiterate how diverse the efforts are of there anabolic steroids.
sentences.cn: 最近的研究重申了合成的类固醇的副作用.

sentences.en: The boy do not move though the teacher reiterate her command.
sentences.cn: 虽然教师一再命令，但这孩子动都不动。

sentences.en: The urgency of the situation makes it necessary to reiterate the monumental problems of population growth.
sentences.cn: 情况的紧迫性使我们有必要重申人口增长的重大问题.

sentences.en: Therefore, I reiterate, literary criticism is useless.
sentences.cn: 因此我说, 文学批评家无用.

sentences.en: They reiterate that South - South cooperation enjoys important comparative advantages and complements rather than replaces North - South cooperation.
sentences.cn: 我们重申,南南合作具有重要的比较优势,是 南北 合作的补充而不是替代.

sentences.en: Thus, we reiterate our utmost admiration for such an achievement.
sentences.cn: 所以, 要向这一成就再一次表示我们最大的欣赏.

sentences.en: We reiterate our determination to promote non - proliferation.
sentences.cn: 我们重申在推动防扩散问题上的决心.

trans.tran_cn: 反复地说, 重申, 重做
trans.tran_en: to repeat a statement or opinion in order to make your meaning as clear as possible
